resources.string:
IDMEFv2-App is a smal IDMEFv2 agent. Using IDMEFv2-App you can send IDMEFv2 messages to a connected IDMEFv2 SIEM and display you location on its map. IDMEFv2-App is a proof of concept implementing format and transport IETF drafts. You can send alerts to your own Concerto SIEM or test the app on the online prototype after registration.

Readme:
https://github.com/IDMEFv2/Android-Alerter

Registration (for url, login password):
https://www.idmefv2.org/android-map

IDMEFv2 Drafts Source code:
https://github.com/IDMEFv2/IDMEFv2-Drafts

Concerto SIEM:
https://github.com/IDMEFv2/Concerto-SIEM

IDMEFv2 Task Force:
https://www.idmefv2.org
